definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish

sentences.english: The port of Mawei, the main port of Fuzhou, is located in the alluvial delta of the Fuzhou Basin.
sentences.chinese: 处在四周由中低山环抱的福州盆地内的马尾港。

sentences.english: The chain surrounded on the back of heel band provides perfect and tight attachment of shoe last to the band.
sentences.chinese: 后跟束紧器链条环抱皮套设计，充分发挥束紧力功能。

sentences.english: A drystone wall enclosed a graveyard where wildflowers grew.
sentences.chinese: 清水石墙环抱着野花丛生的墓地。

sentences.english: It is surrounded by the mountains, forest, and by the Fort Apache Indian Reservation.
sentences.chinese: 群山森林环抱着派恩托普，邻近有福特阿帕切保留区。

sentences.english: The folks live peacefully and abundantly in the village surrounded with green trees and slender bamboos.
sentences.chinese: 绿树和修竹环抱着村子，人们幸福平和地居住在这里。

sentences.english: High in the mountains surrounded by Hashimura from Wushan County, nearly 3 hours.
sentences.chinese: 高桥村处在大山环抱中，距巫山县城有近3小时车程。

sentences.english: It is seen in the width of his arms that encircle you.
sentences.chinese: 它可以从他环抱你的手臂的宽度看出。

sentences.english: The holder supports its ashes just like the ground holds falling leaves.
sentences.chinese: 香台拖着香灰如同大地环抱着落叶。

sentences.english: It is located on the San Francisco Bay and nestles among the rolling hills of Northern California.
sentences.chinese: 它是坐落在旧金山湾和环抱在北加州起伏的山峦中。

sentences.english: The "Tree-hugger Award" is recognition of eco-friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 环抱绿树奖项是一项环境友好的认证。

sentences.english: Gentle rolling hills girdled the city about.
Orchid Pavilion is rounded by mighty mountains, trees are flourishing, and bamboos are dense.
sentences.chinese: 兰亭这地方有崇山峻岭环抱，林木繁茂，竹篁幽密。

sentences.english: They came to the little court, which was shut in by old red walls.
sentences.chinese: 他们来到小天井，这里四周由古老的红墙环抱。

sentences.english: The entire cemetery in Cangsong Cuibai surrounded in solemn silence.
sentences.chinese: 整个墓地在苍松翠柏环抱中，庄严肃穆。

sentences.english: All around, the beauty of the bush enfolds the city in its embrace.
sentences.chinese: 四处灌木锦簇，环抱着整个城市。

sentences.english: He coiled around the moist cloister pillars.
sentences.chinese: 他环抱着回廊那潮湿的柱子。

definition: to be right next to/to lean closely against
to rely on/to depend on/to imitate (a model)/to base a work (on some model)
mountains on one side and water on the other
